title: Is it true that all the cells of our human bodies get replaced periodically? Does it happen for all internal organs too? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes ! Every organ in body is made up of stem cells which replenish dead or old cells in the body..some organs have more potential for dividing and getting replaced like skin , gastrointestinal tract etc. where as cells of brain or heart have less potential to get replenished..Hope it clears the air

No, it is not true. Some cells of our body such as cells of brain, heart are form once in life and cannot get replaced in life. But, some cells like epidermal cells (cells of upper layer of skin) are replaced periodically.
